description:
The people of the Flower Capital get flustered when Kin’emon and the other Akazaya samurai who were supposed to be dead appear from the smoke. However, the last one who walks out of the smoke, and what he says, confuses the people even more.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: He Returns! The Shogun of the Land of Wano, Kozuki Momonosuke
Kikan! Wano Kuni Shougun Kouzuki Momonosuke
Retour au pays. Le shogun de Wano, Kozuki Momonosuké !
Rückkehr! – Der Shogun von Wano-Land, Momonosuke Kozuki
帰還! ワノ国将軍光月モモの助
